EmailTemplate.name: WeLive-Tour-Confirm
EmailTemplate.subject: Tour Confirmation: WeLive {!Tour_Outcome__c.Building_No_City__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
wework
Hi {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_With__c},
You're all set for a tour at WeLive, located at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Location_Address__c}, {!Tour_Outcome__c.Building__c.City__c}, on {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_Date__c} at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Start_Time__c}
{!Tour_Outcome__c.Location_Special_Instructions__c}. If for whatever reason you’re unable to make it, please let us know and we’re happy to reschedule.
We're looking forward to your visit!
The WeLive Team
CALL TO LEARN MORE 888-977-4184
You're receiving this notification email because you booked a tour at WeLive.
WeWork Member Terms | WeWork Member Privacy Policy
This email was sent from WeWork Chelsea. 115 W. 18th St., New York NY 10011 Copyright 2016, WeWork
